frontmatter.title: Types for JavaScript without TypeScript
frontmatter.description: How to have types in JavaScript without TypeScript by using JSDOC comments - defining typedefs in a separate file and using them throughout your codebase.

frontmatter.title: Introduction to Websockets
frontmatter.description: In this blogpost I will be covering the basics of websockets by creating a website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Node.js that allows users to paint on a canvas with other users in realtime.

frontmatter.title: Building a Desktop App using Svelte and Electron
frontmatter.description: In this blogpost I show you how easy it is to build a basic markdown editor for desktop using Svelte and Electron.

frontmatter.title: 10 Book Goal - Forming a Reading Habit
frontmatter.description: On the 25th of March 2019 I decided that by the same day next year I will aim to have read 10 books from start to finish. I completed this goal on the 29th of January 2020 and this blog post showcases the books I read.

frontmatter.title: Lets Create: A Data Visualization using Svelte
frontmatter.description: In this article we'll create a data visualization using the Svelte.js framework that shows, on a map of the UK, which regions have contributed most to English Premier League title wins since its creation in 1992.
